Applications which use this media : 
Generated by Unity (http://unity3d.com/unity/) used by the Unity Web Player (http://unity3d.com/unitywebplayer.html)

Additional information :

1. Magic number(s) : 8 byte ascii string "UnityWeb" at offset 0
2. File extension(s) : unityweb
3. Macintosh file type code : n/a
4. Object Identifiers: n/a

Used as delivery format for the Unity Web Player
